item.description:

item.title: Two new startups!
item.description:
Launch of (1) Cluster, a startup for new journalism + NLP, und (2) judict, a startup for legal data + NLP. Both mentored and financed via EXIST!

Launch of (1) Cluster, a startup for new journalism + NLP, und (2) judict, a startup for legal data + NLP. Both mentored and financed via EXIST!

item.title: Major new DFG research grant!
item.description:
The DFG-funded project “Eidetische Repräsentationen natürlicher Sprache” starts today. This is a massively funded 6-year project looking to advance the state of the art in neural language modeling (BERT, GPT-3).

See the project page for more information.
